# Generated by `boostdep --cmake asio`

# https://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.18.0)

project(boost_asio VERSION "${BOOST_SUPERPROJECT_VERSION}" LANGUAGES CXX)

include_directories(include)
add_library(boost_asio STATIC src/asio.cpp)
add_library(Boost::asio ALIAS boost_asio)

target_include_directories(boost_asio INTERFACE include)
target_compile_definitions(boost_asio PUBLIC BOOST_ASIO_STANDALONE BOOST_ASIO_SEPARATE_COMPILATION)
target_compile_features(boost_asio INTERFACE cxx_std_17)
